Name: Gunpowder Punk
About the game: You play as a cyber enhanced warrior in a pixel art future. Your mission is to defeat all enemies and kill their big boss. Try to get better game score every time you play, to make future play throughs easier. - over 30 different types of weapons - 24 types of enemies - 40 different skills/cybernetics to use - multiple maps - multiple boss enemies - different game modes on every levels Advance in game and collect bigger score to unlock more cybernetics and weapons. You can use your collected points to equip unlocked weapons or keep them to the end to unlock more stuff.
